title: The Power of Spiritual Hope
itunes:title: The Power of Spiritual Hope
description: The Power of Spiritual Hope (2021-07-21) - The openness to possibility is essential on a path of awakening and freedom. In this talk we explore what makes up mature or spiritual hope, and how two meditation practices of presence can nourish our hope.
